articles.title: US interest rates raised to highest level in 16 years - BBC
articles.description: Central banks in the US and Europe lift borrowing costs but the Fed hints it may hold off in future.
articles.content:
The US central bank has raised interest rates to the highest level in 16 years as it battles to stabilise prices.

articles.author: Alex Longley
articles.title: Oil's Dramatic Open Leaves Traders Puzzled After WTI Crashes - Bloomberg
articles.description: After a wave of selling over the last week it was little surprise when US crude futures opened lower on Thursday, but few traders were braced for the 7.2% plunge that unfolded in the first dramatic minutes of trading.
